name: Vectorized 2D Random Walk
description: A particle starts at the origin and has the option of randomly choosing one of four directions for each step.

name: Relativistic Energy
description: Example lab report:  Shows relativistic expressions are correct for masses with speeds approaching the speed of light.

name: Grover's Algorithm (N-qubits)
description: Grover's Algorithm is executed for an arbitrary number of qubits.
